item.title: How to Write Usefully
item.description: Summary A useful essay is one which is novel, correct, important, and strong: A novel essay communicates a “new thing” (point of view, fact, opinion, etc) to at least some of its audience. A correct essay is factually accurate; insofar as is possible. An important essay matters to at least some people. You can measure it by the product of the number of people for which your points matter and how much it matters to those people.
